T_STABLES.Name: Town Stables
T_STABLES.Description: a fenced in area with a shack for the horses... Where are the horses?

T_MAYOR.Name: Town Mayor's House
T_MAYOR.Description: a comfortable one room house with the fireplace lit.

T_GRAVEYARD.Name: Town Graveyard
T_GRAVEYARD.Description: a typical boring graveyard. Wait, what was that?

T_GATES.Name: Town Gates
T_GATES.Description: a road leading to the monsterous wooden gates keeping wildlings out of town. And townsfolk in for that matter.

SW_TREASURE.Name: Sewer
SW_TREASURE.Description: a collapsed sewer tunnel with a chest in the rubble.

S_TRAIN.Name: Sorcerer's Training Room
S_TRAIN.Description: a large room that contains shelves of scrolls. there is also an openening in the wall to what appears to be outside.

S_ROOM.Name: Bedroom
S_ROOM.Description: a small room with only a chest and a bed.

SW_QI.Name: Sewer
SW_QI.Description: a collapsed sewer tunnel with a chest in the rubble.

SW_LOCKED.Name: Sewer
SW_LOCKED.Description: the sewer tunnel is blocked by a gate.

S_LIB.Name: Sorcerer's Library
S_LIB.Description: shelves stocked with books line all of the walls with a table and chairs in the middle.

SW_BOSS.Name: Sewer
SW_BOSS.Description: a crossing in the sewer with a large grate slowly letting out it's contents. You just pretend it's water.

R_TRAIN.Name: Rogue Training Room
R_TRAIN.Description: a mannequin wearing a jacket covered in bells sits in the middle of the room.

R_ROOM.Name: Bedroom
R_ROOM.Description: a small room with only a chest and a bed.

R_HALL.Name: Rogue Hall
R_HALL.Description: a small, dark conference room with no decorations. Just a table and some chairs.

I_KITCHEN.Name: Inn Kitchen
I_KITCHEN.Description: several brick ovens are lit, eminating the smell of delicious food

I_HALL.Name: Inn Meeting Hall
I_HALL.Description: a large dining table sits in this intricately decorated room.

F_ROOM.Name: Bedroom
F_ROOM.Description: a small room with only a chest and a bed.

F_DOJO.Name: Fighter's Dojo
F_DOJO.Description: a large mat is in the center of the room. Two guild members are sparring with wooden swords.

F_ARMORY.Name: Fighter's Armory
F_ARMORY.Description: there are racks of weapons and armor filling this room.

C_TRAIN.Name: Cleric's Training Room
C_TRAIN.Description: members of the guild work to remedy ailments of townsfold, there are a few cots and some seating.

C_STAGE.Name: Church Stage
C_STAGE.Description: a large stage equipped with a podium. You don't recognize the religious symbol attached to the front.

C_ROOM.Name: Bedroom
C_ROOM.Description: a small room with only a chest and a bed.

C_PEWS.Name: Church Pews
C_PEWS.Description: rows of pews sit on either side of you.

C_CONF.Name: Cleric's Conference Room
C_CONF.Description: a room containing a large table with many chairs around it. Scrolls and vials filled with random liquids are scattered on the table.

I_SHOP.Name: Inn Shop
I_SHOP.Description: an elderly lady sits behind a counter. Behind her you see various wares.

I_BAR.Name: Inn Bar
I_BAR.Description: an empty bar with a few tables at the side. The bartender looks pissed.

T_SQUARE.Name: Town Square
T_SQUARE.Description: a large tree stands in the middle of the square with a small platform to the north.
